titleStmt.title: Fiue hundreth points of good husbandry vnited to as many of good huswiferie first deuised, & nowe lately augmented with diuerse approued lessons concerning hopps & gardening, and other needefull matters : together with an abstract before euery moneth, conteining the whole effect of the saide moneth : with a table & a preface in the beginning both necessary to be reade, for the better understandinge of the booke / set forth by Thomas Tusser ...
titleStmt.author: Tusser, Thomas, 1524?-1580.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London in Flete strete within Temple barre at the signe of the Hand & Starre, by Richard Tottill,

notesStmt.note: Pages numbered consecutively on recto only.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.

place.placeName: London in Flete strete within Temple barre at the signe of the Hand
